text: @piersmorgan Peaceful, peaceful have you seen how your peaceful protesters are behaving against unarmed police officers. Absolute disgrace and then they'll wonder how they succumbed to the Coronavirus. I feel sorry for those overworked NHS staff who are going to be inundated after this.
